summary: The Fairness in Veterans' Education Act of 2025 aims to amend Title 38 of the United States Code to ensure the Secretary of Veterans Affairs repays members of the Armed Forces for certain contributions made towards Post-9/11 Educational Assistance. The bill, introduced in the Senate on March 11, 2025, proposes amending section 3327(f)(3) and stipulates the amendment's effective date as August 1, 2025.
